term.title: additive name

item.text: The formal assembly of names for the components of a compound without loss of atoms or groups of atoms from any component.
The addition or attachment of atoms or groups of atoms.

term.sources: 'Corrections to 'A Guide to IUPAC Nomenclature of Organic Compounds'' Favre, H.A.;Hellwich, K.;Moss, G.P.;Powell, W.H.;Traynham, J.G.; Pure and Applied Chemistry 1999 71(7) 1327
